thread.title: Trump: To keep America safe, we need to spend more money on the military
thread.title_full: Trump: To keep America safe, we need to spend more money on the military

author: Matthew J. Belvedere
title: Trump: To keep America safe, we need to spend more money on the military
text:
The United States needs to spend more money on the military to keep the nation safe, President Donald Trump told Fox News.
In a preview of the president's address to a joint session of Congress Tuesday night, the White House said Trump's first budget will call for a $54 billion increase in defense spending and a corresponding cut in what the administration deems lower priority programs.
The military spending could be "$30 billion more than that," the president said on "Fox & Friends" in a taped interview that aired on Tuesday morning. "We're going to upgrade our military substantially."
Trump said when he's finished the U.S. will have the greatest military the nation has ever seen.
